description:
"Rider Among Dead - Mad Zombie Killer Machine Survival is the number one action game that blends the mechanics of off-road racing and survival games. The world has been consumed by a zombie outbreak, leaving you to survive in the wasteland.
You are the best at your job. You protect the ruined city from zombies. People trust you, and this makes you their saviour. To maintain and develop the city back to life, sometimes you have to work together to rebuild the life you once had. The Zombie Apocalypse brought not only the risk to be infected and become a zombie, but also the climate in your region changed roughly.
Explore a big detailed open world map, with a realistic and immersive environment set in the desert. Explore the lands of the unknown where every little spot or corner holds a secret. Drive your way through a zombie apocalypse with your off-road car! Complete challenging missions and tasks. There are very few survivors left, one of them being you! 
Take the last chance to save the humans from extinction! Eradicating zombies has never been more satisfying! Get behind the wheel and play one of the best survival racing games! Keep upgrading your car to become better and better!
Amazing looking graphics! Well-crafted sound design and realistic vehicle physics. A very friendly user interface and easy to use controls. The survivors need your help! 

GAME FEATURES:
- A big open world map with a desert setting
- Challenging missions with good rewards
- A collection of cars to choose from
- Run zombies over with your car and save the people from extinction
- Intense and fun gameplay
- Good looking graphics and amazing sound design!"
name: Rider Among Dead - Mad Zombie Killer Machine Survival
